pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Bridgecrew Python Package[![build status](https://github.com/bridgecrewio/bridgecrew-py/workflows/release/badge.svg)](https://github.com/bridgecrewio/bridgecrew-py/actions?query=workflow%3Arelease)[![PyPI](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/bridgecrew)](https://pypi.org/project/checkov/)Wraps checkov with a bridgecrew cli (does exactly the same)
